trans-unit.source: Enumerates values of the recognizer's state.
trans-unit.target: Nummererer verdiene i den gjenkjenner tilstand.

trans-unit.source: RecognizerState encapsulates the running state of the default speech recognition engine for clients using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> to access the Windows Desktop Speech Recognition Technology service.
trans-unit.target: RecognizerState innkapsler kjører tilstanden til standard-motor for Talegjenkjenning for klienter ved hjelp av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>tilgang til Windows-skrivebordet metoder for talegjenkjenning-tjenesten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Applications can obtain the current state of the desktop recognition engine as a RecognizerState object by querying the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A> property on a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> instance.
trans-unit.target: Programmer kan skaffe gjeldende status for stasjonær recognition-motoren som RecognizerState objekt ved spørring av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>egenskap i en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the state of the desktop recognition engine after it changes, applications can query the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs> object passed to a handler for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Programmer kan spørre for å hente tilstanden for stasjonær recognition motoren når den endres, den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A>for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs>objekt sendt til et behandlingsprogram for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged>hendelser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.StateChangedEventArgs.RecognizerState%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instances run in-process and their running state is under the control of the application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>forekomster kjøre kjørende og deres kjører tilstanden er under kontroll av programmet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> does not contain a property to return a RecognizerState object.
trans-unit.target: Derfor <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>inneholder ikke en egenskap for å returnere et RecognizerState-objekt.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The state of a desktop speech recognition server is a read-only property and cannot be controlled programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke kontrolleres programmatisk tilstanden til en stasjonær tale recognition server er en skrivebeskyttet egenskap.

trans-unit.source: Users can change a shared speech recognizer's state using the Speech Recognition user interface (UI) or through the **Speech Recognition** member of the Windows **Control Panel**.
trans-unit.target: Brukere kan endre en delt tale gjenkjenner tilstand ved hjelp av Talegjenkjenning-brukergrensesnittet (UI) eller til den **talegjenkjenning** medlem av **Kontrollpanel**.

trans-unit.source: Both the **On** and **Sleep** settings in the Speech Recognition UI correspond to the `Listening` state.
trans-unit.target: Både den **på** og **hvilemodus** innstillingene i tale Recognition Brukergrensesnittet svarer til de `Listening` tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The **Off** setting in the Speech Recognition UI corresponds to Stopped.
trans-unit.target: Den **av** innstillingen i tale Recognition Brukergrensesnittet tilsvarer stoppet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> is the other property that affects the readiness of a shared speech recognition engine to receive and process speech input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>er egenskapen som påvirker klargjøring av en delt motor for Talegjenkjenning å motta og behandle taleinndata.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> to control whether or not a shared speech recognition engine's grammars are active for recognition.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>til å kontrollere om en delt tale recognition motor grammars er aktive for føring.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, changing the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A> property has no effect on the RecognizerState property.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis du endrer den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>egenskapen har ingen innvirkning på egenskapen RecognizerState.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Information such as the description, the supported culture and audio formats, and the recognition engine name is encapsulated in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> type.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon som beskrivelsen, støttede kulturen og lyd formater og navnet på recognition motoren innkapslet i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo>type.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo>

trans-unit.source: The recognition engine is available to receive and analyze audio input.
trans-unit.target: Motoren for recognition er tilgjengelig til å motta og analysere inndata.

trans-unit.source: The recognition engine is not receiving or analyzing audio input.
trans-unit.target: Gjenkjenning-motoren er ikke motta eller analysere inndata.
